NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.name: NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST
NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.cause: Fill in the cause of the test fail.
NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.treatment: Fill in the recommendation for fixing the fail.

DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an abnormally high variation between inward vs outward dependencies count per microservice!
DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend revising the dependencies between components.
DEPENDENCIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 0 outward dependencies.
Service "Service B" has 2 outward dependencies.
Service "Service C" has 0 outward dependencies.

SCC_TEST.name: SCC_TEST
SCC_TEST.cause: We identified no strongly connected components between the microservices.

NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected high variation between microservice's sizes.
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend reconsidering the sizes of the microservices.
NANOENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 4 nanoentities.
Service "Service B" has 7 nanoentities.
Service "Service C" has 2 nanoentities.

ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.name: ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.cause: We detected an acceptable variation between entities counts per microservice.
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.treatment: We recommend revising the use of Bounded Contexts in the design process.
ENTITIES_COMPOSITION_TEST.details:
Service "Service A" has 2 entities.
Service "Service B" has 2 entities.
Service "Service C" has 1 entities.
